column2: BRIEF-Navios Maritime Acquisition Says Q1 Revenue Fell 28.4 Pct To $46.2 Mln May 10 (Reuters) - Navios Maritime Acquisition Corp: * ORATION REPORTS FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR THE FIRST QUARTER ENDED MARCH 31, 2018 * CURRENTLY, NAVIOS ACQUISITION HAS CONTRACTED 77.2% OF ITS AVAILABLE DAYS ON A CHARTER-OUT BASIS FOR 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
